member.name: M:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.ByteArrayConverter.GetJsonStringFromBytes(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets string representation of the byte range that is optimized for passed in JSON.
member.param: Buffer to get the bytes from. Not null.
Offset in the buffer to get the bytes from.
member.returns: A string that contains the bytes encoded either as utf8, or base64, or compressed and then encoded as base64. The string is empty if the byte array is empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.ByteArrayConverter.GetBytesFromJsonString(System.String)
member.summary: Extract byte array from the string that was encoded by .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.JsonArguments
member.summary: Supports deferred type resolution of JSON-serialized arguments.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.JsonResponseMessage
member.summary: Supports deferred resolution of JSON response result types.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.JsonRpcStream
member.summary: An RPC stream that reads and writes messages using JSON serialization.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.JsonRpcStream.ContractResolver
member.summary: Override to prevent camel-casing dictionary keys. (Property names are still camel-cased.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.JsonRpcStream.SerializerSettings
member.summary: Gets the serializer settings used by all JsonRpcStream instances.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.JsonRpcStream.Serializer
member.summary: Gets a serializer created from the settings used by all JsonRpcStream instances.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.SafeWriteBufferedStream
member.summary: A stream that wraps readable and writable streams and provides buffering for writing. Disposing of SafeWriteBufferedStream won't throw if the underlying writable pipe throws on flash, which buffered stream may attempt. The write buffer size is 16K, the same as the maximum SSH channel data message size.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Cascade.Rpc.Json.WrappedStream
member.summary: A stream that uses one stream for reading, and another one for writing.
member.remarks: This class is a deriviation of CombinedStream from https://github.com/AArnott/Nerdbank.Streams. Nerdbank.Streams doesn't support net46, and we need it to support it for VS 15.9.
